channel.title: [PI] Give items points [PI]
channel.description:
I have created a vote point shop but I don't know how to make an item have vote points
Other: also how can i get all the points go into something like say you get some pest control points and they count as detectedpoints too and you get slayer points and they also count as detectedpoints how can i make that? I can probably figure out by searching through files but that will take a while

@Loveandpower wrote:

Go to shopassistant I believe it is in your server folder.

you will see something like specialvalues.

it goes something like this

case item id:
return amount;

then you have to make sure to have the item int he store of course.

item.title: [PI] Give items points [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

[quote=“wildskiller, post:3, topic:392711”]ok…well what i was talking about is like say i put a korasi inside my store but it says 0 vote points needed to purchase this item
but im wanting it to say you need 35 vote points needed to puchase this item[/quote]

and you want to be able to spent slayer pts pest control pts or a combination of the 2+?

You could just make it Subtract pts instead of Coins… and check for pts instead of coins… instead of if (playerHasItem(Item,Amt) > shopValue)

You would do

if (ptValue >= shopValue)
ptValue -= shopValue;
addItem

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Give items points [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Are you saying you want a shop to determine the price of an item and value of it based on a different system then already coded in to most PI sources?

and then you want your part 2 to just Check multiple pt values?

you could do something like

if (shopPrice <= (c.slayerPts+c.pcPts)) {
     int Pts = c.slayerPts;
     if (slayerPts > shopPrice) {
          slayerPts -= shopPrice
     } else {
          Pts -= shopPrice;
          c.slayerPts = 0;
          c.pcPts+Pts;//Pts is Negative so it will subtract numbers from Pest Control Pts...
     }

This is an Example… I dont know PI very well…

Read full topic
